meanings.definition: Give a brief statement of the main points of (something).
meanings.sent1: She summarised the story for her friend in just a few sentences.
meanings.sent2: The teacher summarised the lesson at the end of class.
meanings.sent3: The cat summarised its day by napping in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His painting beautifully summarised the essence of nature.
meanings.sent5: The map summarised the entire journey with clear landmarks.

meanings.definition: Present the main points in a concise form.
meanings.sent1: He summarised the report to highlight the key findings.
meanings.sent2: The article summarised the research findings in a single paragraph.
meanings.sent3: The robot summarised the instructions in a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile summarised her happiness better than words could.
meanings.sent5: The sunset summarised the beauty of the day in a burst of colors.
